solution_line_template: After subtracting {subtraction_value} from the number of turtles on Happy Island, we get {turtles_happy_island} - {subtraction_value} = <<{turtles_happy_island}-{subtraction_value}={turtles_after_subtraction}>>{turtles_after_subtraction} turtles

Dividing this number by {division_value}, we find that the number of turtles on Lonely Island is {turtles_after_subtraction}/{division_value}=<<{turtles_after_subtraction}/{division_value}={turtles_lonely_island}>>{turtles_lonely_island} turtles.
